page.title: 17 TRANSPORT IN STANLEY
page.content: Many bus-companies use Stanley bus-station.The two main ones are Hunters and Northern.The oldest bus is a Mark 1 National,and it's registration is OCN 74W.Northern employs approximately 214 people to work in the station,and it is estimated a bus leaves the stand every 3 minutes.Bus-drivers work a 7-hour day.The bus-station opened on 30th of August,1974.Northern drive 16,000,000 miles,use 10 tons of tickets,and carry 140,000,000 people all in 1 year!The safety factor is very high.Each bus has 67 checks per fortnight.People can hire buses from the station,and quite a lot do.The buses are painted every 2 and a half years.The company employs 5 cleaners to look after the upkeep of the station.There are 12 stands from which 700 buses leave,conveying passengers to their destinations.
